attributes.action: Outlaw the use of Aardvarks as slave labour.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned insist that the use of Aardvarks for slave labour in Mayfair penthouses, more specifically Craig Davids abode, ('can i get a rewind?'), must end.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
